name: Gary
placeOfBirth: Lake Jessicaborough, Svalbard & Jan Mayen Islands
description: Gary is a green-eyed llama with black hair, standing 116 cm tall. Originally from Lake Jessicaborough, Svalbard & Jan Mayen Islands, Gary enjoys knitting, reading, hiking. Known for their playful and mischievous personality, Gary is a beloved member of the llama community.
